hero_section.t_heading: Looking for a Fullstack | Frontend developer?

hero_section_desc.t_first_paragraph: I’m a fullstack developer and IT student passionate about building modern, efficient, and meaningful software. I love exploring every layer of development — from crafting beautiful, responsive frontends to engineering reliable backends and low-level systems in Go, C, C++, C#, and Rust.
hero_section_desc.t_second_paragraph: Even as a student, I approach every project with a professional mindset: I aim for clean architecture, strong performance, and long-term scalability.For me, programming isn’t just about writing code — it’s about solving real problems, learning continuously, and pushing technology forward.I’m always looking for opportunities to grow and learn something new.

about.first_entry_paragraph: I’m a passionate student developer focusing mainly on frontend technologies with a solid backend & system-level knowledge of programming.
about.second_entry_paragraph: I’m focused on deepening my experience with modern frontend frameworks including React, Vue, Angular or Svelte.

cv_section.first_paragraph: I'm glad you've come this far. You're only a few steps away from discovering why I'm the Fullstack | Frontend Developer you're looking for. Take a look at my CV using the buttons below.
cv_section.second_paragraph: You might be also interested in looking at my other qualities.

motivation.heading: Why should you choose me?
motivation.desc: There are many Fullstack | Frontend developer so why exactly me?
motivation.paragraph: Here are some of the main reasons why I am the one you are looking for.

reasons.heading: Flexibility
descs: One of my biggest pros is definitely flexibility. I am highly capable of adapting in my work. Wether it's learning a completely new framework, adjusting to project requirements, or exploring unfamiliar technologies.

reasons.heading: Fast learning
descs: I have a really strong ability to learn quickly and apply new knowledge efficiently. As a student, I am constantly exploring new programming languages or new technologies which will make my life easier in the future. This fast-learning mindset enables me to stay up-to-date with industry trends and rapidly take on new challanges.

reasons.heading: Code maintainability
descs: Writing maintainable code is one of my top priorities when writing any application. I focus on creating clean, readable, and well organized code that can be easily understood and improved by others. By emphasizing best practices and thoughtful design, I ensure that my work not only functions correctly but also supports possible future application updates.

reasons.heading: Rapid development
descs: I also aim for rapid development using the best tools there are. In the past few months I have been coding a lot in technologies and frameworks which make rapid development more that possible and have a lot of the modern features out of the box. This quickly brings my ideas to life. I enjoy finding ways to optimize workflows, automate repetitive tasks, and implement solutions that are both functional and scalable.

contact.heading: Contact
contact.desc: If you are interested in collaborating or working with me. Don't hesitate to contact me using some of the options below.

footer.t_about_site_content: This website was developed using Svelte and designed in Figma.
